title: team builder
body: why is no one using that? just wondering because everyone get to play the lane they want don't need to call lanes everytime and I know someone will probably say because no one use it but the way I see is because no one use it if more player use it I think it will be faster like normal queue

replies.body: Plenty of people don't queue up for a game thinking "This game I want to play 'x' champion in 'x' role". Unless there's a new champion or something I specifically want to try out, I'd rather have some idea of what my teammates are playing before I pick

Well, the answer is quite simple (I say simple but it's really a bit complicated). The reason no one uses TB is because of the ridiculous queue times (30+ minutes to find a team, 15+ minutes to find opponents at the best of times based on personal experience). So, why does TB have ridiculous queue times? Because no one uses it. Are you starting to see the pattern here?

It's not going to change unless a whole lot of people (and I mean a ridiculous amount of people) start using it regardless of queue times, which isn't exactly going to happen.

thats not the problem, the problem is nobody plays support. on blind pick they either have to play support or they feed. since nobody chooses to play support thats why the queue times are so large. even if you had more people playing it, then even more people would still not wanna play support. in fact it may even grow exponentially, in that the more people that play it the longer the queue times will be. most people are asking for normal draft pick, that way pick order takes preference and there isnt a scramble for a position in pre-game chat and then an argument about who got it and then threats of going to feed and stuff

> the problem is nobody plays support.

I have to disagree with you there. In my experience there is rarely an issue with someone not wanting to play support, most people I get matched with are capable of accepting it or even want it (and I'd say there are more who actually want it). When I play TB support is the first or second position to be filled, usually it's ADC/Top/Jungle that I end up having to wait on, I even wait on mid more than on support.
